Title: It Boy
Writer: Amro Hamzawi (original idea), Amro Hamzawi (scenario and dialogue), David Moreau (scenario and dialogue), Amro Hamzawi (adaptation), David Moreau (adaptation), Virginie Efira (adaptation)
Actors: Virginie Efira, Pierre Niney, Charles Berling, Gilles Cohen
Plot: Alice works for "Rebelle" magazine, where she needs to let her hair down to get a promotion. When Balthazar returns a lost USB to Alice, the appearance of dating someone half her age helps her. Does it get real?
